short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension can help you check HTML blocks for issues with long words, phrases, or big images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Open any website.
2. Click on the extension's button.
3. Adjust the parameters and click on the "Check" button.

To reset all changes, refresh the page.
